author: jstrachan
msg: added some extra helper Maven build goals

author: rdonkin
msg: Clarify  usage of .betwixt files documentation (based on personal email from james).

author: rdonkin
msg: Added xml output testing code which causes maven classloading problems. The tests that cause these problems are currently commented out but committing them should allow maven to be debugged.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added some helper methods to make it easier to work with streams.
flush() and close() allow flushing & closing of the underlying stream.
writeXmlDeclaration("<xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' ?>") allows you to output whatever XML declaration you want.
